title: Roasted Garlic and Chive Cauliflower Mash
directions: 2 cups low-sodium vegetable stock (you may need an extra cup if you have a large head of cauliflower)
2 tablespoons diced fresh chives, plus more for garnish
2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling
ingredients: 2 cups low-sodium vegetable stock (you may need an extra cup if you have a large head of cauliflower)
2 tablespoons diced fresh chives, plus more for garnish
2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling
